short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View CSV files in the browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The CSV File Viewer & Manager extension allows you to seamlessly open, view, and manage CSV files directly in your browser without downloading them. Key features include:

View CSV Files: Instantly view CSV files in a table format.
Search Functionality: Easily search within CSV files to find the data you need.
Download Functionality: Easily download opened CSV with one button click.
User-Friendly Interface: A clean and intuitive interface for enhanced productivity.
